name: Hooks And Shotguns
description:
Hooks And Shotguns is a bullet-hell platformer where you have to save your brother!

Shoot shotguns and swing around like a madman! In Hooks & Shotguns, your brother, who is the only family have left, has been captured in a soul trap by your life-long enemy, Silo, before he broke it to pieces. You have to put it back together and save him!
